name: WayDown
description: After a traumatic battle, you've been cursed to walk the earth unable to truly die, you're thrust into battle after battle, dying over and over unable to rest. Until you find the last Nazi bunker, Bunker 666.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any will work, really. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: The kind that plays noises. Additional Notes: We also prefer that players have a screen.
